document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Ruldegost Villa on the Street of Whispers.
document_data.name: Ruldegost Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Ruldegost Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Ruldegost]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the western section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the southwest corner of where [[Grimwald's Way]] met the [[Street of Whispers]]. The west side of the villa also sat upon [[Seawatch Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: There were four buildings within the walled estate with gardens and a small pond in between. The two larger buildings sat in the northeast and northwest corners of the estate. The buildings were three or four stories tall.
